description: Numbers n whose base-16 representation has exactly 2 runs.
links: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: N:= 3; # get all results <= 16^Nsort([seq(seq(seq(seq((a*(16^n-16^k)+b*(16^k-1))/15, k=1..n-1),n=2..N),b={$0..15} minus {a}),a=1..15)]); # _Robert Israel_, Dec 11 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
